basics.name: Patrick van Staveren
basics.label: Global Head of IT Infrastructure at Mintel
basics.summary:
Leader, software developer, systems engineer, network administrator and all-around techie nerd.  My passion might be systems, but I love managing people and learning how to help them to achieve big goals.

In my spare time over the years I've worked with several free software projects, enjoy outdoor activities, photography, and high-altitude ballooning.
Follow me on Github: https://github.com/trickv/
Read more about my personal projects: http://trick.vanstaveren.us/

work.summary: Continuing the same role I've been doing but from a new locale!

Responsible for IT Infrastructure team globally, looking after all servers and networks for all our offices.
Led datacenter migration project moving our primary datacenter across London.
Grown Infrastructure team from 5 to 10 members based in London and Chicago.
Focused team on continuous learning to improve service reliability and reduce out-of-hours calls.
Working with key vendors who provide infrastructure services.

work.position: Head of IT, APAC and Global Head of IT Infrastructure
work.summary:
Continued to manage IT in APAC whilst taking over Global IT Infrastructure role.
Took over Global Infrastructure team overseeing staff in London and Chicago, managing all servers and networks across the company.
Developed staff to focus on continuous delivery software deployment systems to bring value to clients faster.
Led IT work on larger office relocation projects ranging from 15 to 75 seats.
Worked with architects to design M&E floor plans and advised on experience from other Mintel locations across the globe.

Oversaw and managed all IT teams in APAC including software development and IT support for the region.
Managed growth of IT footprint as we expanded from three to six offices in APAC.
Led office installation and relocation projects for satellite offices.
Took special interest in network administration to facilitate IT service delivery on behalf of London-based Infrastructure team.
Managing IT project managers in our Chicago-based software development team and implementing global department strategy.

Managed small international team of developers working on field associate data entry system.
Worked with major clients to deliver customized web deliverables including advising on project setup and proposals.
Continued to develop websites and expanding skills to include unit testing, continuous integration and Python programming.
PHP/MySQL web developer working on Mintel field associate data collection and presentation systems.
